item.description:
Join us on December 11th at Middlesex Community College, Lowell, MA for a day of games and fun- try something new or reconnect with a favorite. Learn about games you've never even heard about with our Speed Gaming Event!

Timeline:

11:30-12:00 Registration, check in, coffee, mingling
12:00-1:30: Speed Gaming- Rotate stations to learn about the RPGs offered. 5-10 minutes per game, hopefully you'll meet your dream game!
2:00-5:30 Open Gaming: Each RPG will last between 2-4 hours. There are plenty of board games and gm'less games to fill the extra time so we hope you'll get to "date" a few choices!
5:30- Yankee Swap! Celebrate the holidays early! Bring a wrapped gift, $5-10 limit or a regift of something cool! Creativity counts, bonus points for something game related! We may order pizza to just hang for a bit before the night ends.

Role Playing Games
We are still confirming the specific games offered- check Brilliantgameologists.com for updates.
Ideas/ Possibilities:
  • Inspectres
  • Mouse Guard
    D&D 4
  • Burning Wheel
  • Primetime Adventures
  • Zombie Cinema

[Want to play something specific or run a game? Contact us ASAP!]

Board Games
Along with the RPGâ€™s will be a collection of board games including Small World, Dominion, Race for the Galaxy, Zombies!, Settlers of Catan, Carcassone, Ticket to Ride, Pillars of the Earth, Agricola, Word on the Street, Say Anything, Apples to Apples and many more! If you are counting on a specific game on this list or hope to try one not listed, let us know so we don't forget it!

Location:
Middlesex Community College Lowell- cafeteria
33 Kearney Square, Lowell
Address/ Directions

Parking:
MCC has a parking garage- the Lower Docks Garage off of Warren Street with a walkway to the MCC building. There is also on-street parking, but it is limited.

Registration:
Register by October 10th so we know how many snacks and games to get and prep! On site registration works too, but we may have to do some shuffling so we would love if you register ahead of time!

Admission: $5
If you partake of the snack table, we ask that you donate towards that too. We're about $60 behind from previous playdates and hoping to make some of that back!

Contact and Registration:
To register, confirm here!
Questions? Send an email to gm@brilliantgameologists.com or twitter us at @bg_podcast

Check the website for updated information: [url=http://brilliantgameologists.com/playdate20101211/[/url]
Go to BrilliantGameologists.com/Mailer and sign up for the mailing list
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the cafeteria! Follow the signs!
item.name: PlayDate: December 11, Lowell MA
